testcase.name: CLHPE-0008
testcase.summary:
Check when the left arrow is clicked, the user should see the previous photo, and when the right arrow is clicked, the next photo should be displayed in body,
Check in the navigation arrows transition between photos is quick (without delays) in body
Check in the navigation arrows area animation during the photo transition (if applicable) should work correctly and smoothly in body, 
Check in the navigation arrows area animation during the photo transition (if applicable) should work correctly and smoothly in body
